scripts.wasm-pack: wasm-pack build --out-name index --out-dir lib/src/wasm-pack ../ --target web -- --features "$FEATURES" -Z build-std=std,panic_abort && rm src/wasm-pack/package.json
scripts.esbuild: npm run clean && npm run wasm-pack && WEBGL=false node build.mjs && tsc -m es2022 -outDir ./dist/esbuild --emitDeclarationOnly
scripts.esbuild-webgl: npm run clean && FEATURES=web-webgl npm run wasm-pack && WEBGL=true node build.mjs  && tsc -m es2022 -outDir ./dist/esbuild --emitDeclarationOnly
